name: Virus killer (devilskeyStudio)
description:
Virus killer is a game about killing viruses with a pill canon. The game is made as a submission for the stay safe Game jam.

the game has 4 levels, 1 tutorial stage and a bonus level where you can fight against the devilskeyStudio logo.

the game has a funny style to it and can be easly picked up bij everyone with a mouse and pc.
